text: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُمْ فِى رَحْمَتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous.
translation.id.indonesian: Kami telah memasukkan mereka kedalam rahmat Kami. Sesungguhnya mereka termasuk orang-orang yang saleh.
